instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data:
Install and secure joints as per manufacturer’s recommendations.
Check paint compatibility and recommended drying time of the applied joint compound.
Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from dust and dirt and all possible contaminants.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Primer: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Flat Latex B‑701 Topcoat (2 coats): Virtuoso™ Silk Touch™

instructions.title: SERVICE CONDITIONS
instructions.data:
Allow to dry for at least 7 days after application to reach full stain resistance.
Wipe stains off with moderate pressure using a soft cloth and household cleaner.
Do not use abrasive cleaners as these may damage the paint film.

calculator.title: Primer
calculator.item: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Latex Flat Latex B‑701

calculator.title: Note: Install and secure joints as per manufacturer's recommendation
